ai_enhance.help:
âŒ *AI Enhance - Usage Guide*

You must reply to an image to use this feature.

ğŸ“Œ *How to use:*
1. Send or receive an image
2. Reply to the image
3. Type one of the commands below

âœ¨ *Available Commands*
â€¢ {prefix}ai-enhance â†’ Enhance image quality
â€¢ {prefix}ai-enhance bg â†’ Remove background
â€¢ {prefix}ai-enhance upscale â†’ Upscale image to 4K

ğŸ“ *Example*
Reply to an image and type:
{prefix}ai-enhance

âš ï¸ Notes:
â€¢ Processing takes 5â€“15 seconds
ai_enhance.wait: â³ *AI is processing your image, please wait...*
ai_enhance.success:
âœ… *Process Completed!* (Enhanced)

âœ¨ Image enhanced successfully.
